articles.author: Beatrice Nolan
articles.title: Trump administration bars Europeans from U.S. for pressuring tech firms to "censor" American speech - Fortune
articles.description: The move targets architects of the EU’s Digital Services Act and anti-disinformation advocates—triggering diplomatic condemnation from Europe’s leaders.
articles.content: The Trump administration has barred five Europeans from entering the U.S., accusing them of pressuring American tech companies to censor or suppress American speech online. The individualsThierry Bre… [+4199 chars]
